Class PhysicsBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ep.ggs.world.blocks.classicmodel.ClassicBlock
      • com.ep.ggs.world.blocks.classicmodel.PhysicsBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tick, Block, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends ClassicBlock
implements Tick

        Specified by:
        onDelete in interface Block
        Overrides:
        onDelete in class ClassicBlock
        Parameters:
        l - The level the block was deleted in
        Returns:
        True if you would like the action to be canceled. False if the action should continue.

      • initAtStart

        public abstract boolean initAtStart()
        Whether this block should be added to the tick when the level loads.
        Returns:
        True if this block should be added to the tick when the level loads. False if this block should not be added to the tick when the level loads.

        public boolean runInSeperateThread()
        Whether this physics block should tick outside the physics thread.
        Returns:
